MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: git add . git commit -m "implementing scale out" git push azure master

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration> <system.webServer>
<webSocket enabled="false" /> <handlers>
<add name="iisnode" path="app.js" verb="*" modules="iisnode"/> </handlers> <rewrite> <rules>
<rule name="NodeInspector" patternSyntax="ECMAScript" stopProcessing="true"> <match url="^app.js\/debug[\/]?" /> </rule>
<rule name="StaticContent"> <action type="Rewrite" url="public{REQUEST_URI}"/> </rule>
<rule name="DynamicContent"> <conditions> <add input="{REQUEST_FILENAME}" matchType="IsFile" negate="True"/> </conditions> <action type="Rewrite" url="app.js"/> </rule> </rules> </rewrite>
</system.webServer> </configuration>
